document_data.name: Eldratha
document_data.mainbody: Queen '''Eldratha''' of [[Larlotha]] was an elven queen, known to the elves of [[Cormanthor]] of the 3{{rd}} century [[DR]].
document_data.Legacy: A bust of hers was kept in the [[Vault of Ages]] in [[Cormanthor]] as of {{yearlink|241}}. The bust was arm-tall, and made of solid marble.
